about.lead: We partner with master artisans across India to bring handloom textiles to a global audience, preserving heritage while innovating in design.
about.copy: PentadStyles works directly with artisan communities to produce small-batch collections using natural fibers and time-honored techniques. Our design language blends minimal silhouettes with cultural motifs, resulting in pieces that feel both rooted and modern.
